## ✅ Checklist

Before submitting this PR, please make sure:

- [ ] I have read the [contribution guidelines](CONTRIBUTING.md)
- [ ] My content follows the wiki's style and formatting conventions
- [ ] I have tested that my changes render correctly
- [ ] I have checked for spelling and grammatical errors
- [ ] My changes are accurate and well-sourced
- [ ] I have added appropriate metadata (frontmatter) if creating new pages

- [ ] Game mechanics documentation
- [ ] Item/resource information
- [ ] Location/map content
- [ ] Skill guides
- [ ] Character information
- [ ] Bug fixes or corrections
